releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 改进 使用 Kaned1as 维护的 jaudiotagger 以支持 opus 格式音乐标签读取
  2. 修复 从后台返回主播放器时随机崩溃
  3. 修复 艺术家详情页顶部消失 (自 v0.5.3)
  4. 开发 清理重构代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Improve: using Kaned1as version of jaudiotagger, to support reading tags of opus format
  2. Fix: random crashes when going back to Main Player from background
  3. Fix: missing header of Artist Detail (Since v0.5.3)
  4. Development: cleanup and refactor codes

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 排序方式“时长”无效
  2. 修复 无法真正关闭自动检查更新(v0.4.0起)
  3. 开发 清理重构代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: sort mode Duration is invalid
  2. Fix: can't turn off Check for update automatically (since v0.4.0)
  3. Development: cleanup and refactor code

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 在播放队列中, 移动相同歌曲时崩溃
  2. 修复 排序方式“时长”无效
  3. 翻译 更新 俄语(by PhotonGilbert and ElinaAndreeva), 土耳其语(by Erdem Özdemir), 意大利语(by gdonisi and ndrea Enzo Lattmann), 德语(worldtest), 波兰语(Robert Biś), 日语(by aorinngo)
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: crash when moving same songs in Playing Queue
  2. Fix: sort mode Duration is invalid
  3. Translation: update Russian(by PhotonGilbert and ElinaAndreeva), Turkish(by Erdem Özdemir), Italian(by gdonisi and ndrea Enzo Lattmann), German(worldtest), Polish(Robert Biś), Japanese(by aorinngo)
